root.name: Hidden Invasion
root.description: Hidden Invasion is a single or multiplayer game for the PlayStation2 and GameCube. Players can choose one of the two playable characters.The game takes place in 2027. Dean Travis and Karen Bride, members of the Shadowforce Team, is sent to assassinate the leader of a terrorist organization. Eventually they learn of an alien conspiracy and must try to defeat the invaders.Characters:Dean TravisStrength: 4 Speed: 3 Stamina: 4 Weapon Proficiency: 2 Karen BrideStrength: 3 Speed: 4 Stamina: 3 Weapon Proficiency: 4
